page.title: 09FARMING(cont.)
page.content: for human consumption. To reach the standard of milk needed they are fed a mixture of high energy 14-16 nuts and sugarbeet. If the butterfat content falls below 4.5%, 3 months in a row, the contract with the milkboard will be lost. Effect of E.E.C. The E.E.C. has affected the farm greatly. For instance,it has stopped the farm from expanding because of the milk restrictions.This means that the farmer cannot afford to buy more cows or rear more calves to bring into the herd. This,in turn means that more land cannot be bought because funds are not available.There is not enough land to go into beef or arable nor finance to go into silage. Therefore the farm will continue with the dairy herd unless the E.E.C.policy changes.
